tags: seriously let the shiny boy be shiny
not even a martial arts suit or anything
not even a wall poster from a kung fu movie??
summary: watched MHA episodes again and just noticed a couple of things in the room king/dorm episode FIRST OF ALL Aoyama has a LOT of...
body:
watched MHA episodes again and just noticed a couple of things in the room king/dorm episode

FIRST OF ALL

Aoyama has a LOT of really long dangly earrings and necklaces and we NEVER SEE HIM WEAR THEM

He canonically owns a ton of sparkly jewelry

but is never allowed to be bling and pretty

LET THE SHINY BOY BE SHINY

…And also

Just minor commentary here and I know the whole bit was about how ‘normal’ Ojiro is that everything is really plain but, there’s… No personality in his room. None. It’s like he learned he was moving, had to suddenly buy a ton of the cheapest Ikea furniture, and hoped no one would notice.

I mean, even Shoji’s minimalist room has… Flavor. Personality.

It’s like Ojiro just had nothing to even bring with him.

….

…. what… what’s Ojiro’s family situation/home life? Does anyone know? DOES THIS BOY HAVE PARENTS

blog.description: The name's Rev. I'm 23, nb or genderfluid, queer, she/her/they/them mostly. Bakugou is my boy! Follow back from Pink-hair-revolution.

tags: this would be really super cute if I knew more about pokemon
unfortunately I'm just a collector and not a trainer type lol
title: Request Wednesday: “My Pokedex is Lacking”
body:
Bakugou x Kirishima

The battle was long and difficult, but Kirishima triumphed in the end. His Onyx was exhausted and his Tyranitar stood nearly defeated.

The other trainer lost gracelessly though. Came up to him screaming, “How the fuck did I lose to a rock typer?!”

Kirishima laughed it off, “I honestly don’t know. I didn’t even think I stood a chance against someone who specializes in explosion. Your Golem nearly did me in”

“Well it won’t happen again,” the guy promised. “I’ll train them until nothing can beat them.”

“Me too!” Kirishima agreed, completely disregarding the guy’s competitive tone.

“No, I’m challenging you!”

“And I’m challenging you! We’ll train hard and both of our teams will be triumphant!”

“We can’t both be number one,” he snarled.

Kirishima just grinned back at him, “Why not? We could team up. My rock types, your specialized pokemon. We’d be unstoppable!”

The guy looked confused, angry. Didn’t know how to respond to someone so positive, “I- I think that would be pretty cool actually.” His brows were still furrowed and he still had a frown on his face.

“Yeah?” Kirishima’s smile grew, knew it would be best to travel in a team. That they could become ace trainers faster if they were together. “We could even go hunting. Maybe find some rare pokemon? My pokedex is lacking,” he laughed.

“Y-yeah,” the guy agreed. “How do you do that?”

“What?”

“Just… you’re so nice.”

“Oh. Well that’s easy. You were amazing in that battle. It’d be better to be friends with you than enemies,” Kirishima smiled.

“Right,” the guy looked around a little confused like he didn’t know how to respond to other trainers being nice to him. “Well… we should get going then.”

“Alright!”

blog.description: ᴍʏ ʜᴇʀᴏ ᴀᴄᴀᴅᴇᴍɪᴀ💥sᴀʟʟʏ ғᴀᴄᴇ🎭ᴠᴏʟᴛʀᴏɴ🌌ʏᴜʀɪ ᴏɴ ɪᴄᴇ⛸ᴘʀᴏᴜᴅ ʜᴜғғʟᴇᴘᴜғғ💛

body:
Kirishima Headcanons

(Got bored during a lecture so enjoy some soft headcanons💖)

-he has a shark onesie

-definitely has a shark plushie

-he wants a house near a beach

-his teeth aren’t sensitive to the cold??

-when he’s gets ice cream he’ll bite into it and Denki has a full on panic attack

-can and will fall asleep anywhere

-one time he fell asleep on top of the fridge (don’t ask)

-favorite dog breed is a Golden Retriever

-he knows how to use makeup

-he likes photography

-loves taking pictures of flowers and nature

-he’s not a coffee or tea person

-he’s a protein shake person

-has a hiding place for snacks

-he’s only told Bakugou where it is

-hugger

-won’t just go around hugging random people but he’s always willing to give a hug to a friend in need

-loves flowers crowns

-has forced Bakugou to wear a flower crown

blog.name: tobobio
blog.title: Bakubros
blog.description: i write Bakugou x reader scenarios. Ask box: CLOSED I try to post everyday. Art blog: momobuta

summary: hi! may I request a scenario where fem!reaader borrows kacchan's clothes? LIKE A LOT OF THEM how would katsu react THANK YOU
question: hi! may I request a scenario where fem!reaader borrows kacchan's clothes? LIKE A LOT OF THEM how would katsu react THANK YOU
answer:
hope you enjoy!

‘Where the fuck did that jacket go…’ Bakugou mentally cursed to himself.

He had been spending hours scavenging his room, practically flipping the entire space upside down, in search for his beloved hoodie, even going next door to accuse his red-head companion for stealing his clothing. But to no avail as he still couldn’t find it.

And this wasn’t the first time his clothes went missing. As a matter of fact this entire week he had noticed that more and more of his shirts and jackets were missing from his closet each day and it only fueled the irritation in the ash blonde. He even went as far as to spying out in the laundry room for any suspects for thieving his clothes.

He grumbled a curse to himself as he stepped out of his dorm room and headed towards yours. Him and his precious girlfriend of 1 year had planned a date for tonight and he knew better than to keep you waiting, knowing that if he kept you waiting too long you would sulk and pout all night.

A few seconds after he hit the door with a few light knocks it opened, welcoming his lover. The attire she wore completely washed away his previous frustrations.

“Katsu-!”

“Oi. where did you get that hoodie.”

You paused, looking down at the large black material that was obviously much too big for you. Your gaze looking back up to meet the heated stare of your boyfriend.

“I um-”

“I’ve been looking for that shit everywhere and you had it the whole time?!” he snapped, walking forward causing you to back further into your room. Your hands flew up in front of you in defense.

“I thought you knew!!”

“Well obviously I fucking didn’t!!!”

He turned his head towards your closet, changing his line of direction to the stack of clothing in the shelves. He started hastily digging through your clothing, pulling out various black shirts adorned with the familiar skull design.

“Katsuki! What are you doing!!”

“Taking back what’s fucking mine, that’s what I’m fucking doing!!!”

You pulled at his arms, attempting to get him to stop for he was making an even bigger mess of clothes onto your floor, along with the beloved shirts you stole from your boyfriend being torn from your possession.

“Stop!- Hey!!!”

Once he finally got the last bit of the missing clothing, he turned to you. Arms crossed and looking at you like a parent scolding his child.

“Why did you take my clothes without telling me?”

You stood silently, pouting with your gaze pulled away from him.

“Answer me.”

“I… I like wearing your clothes… because it smells like you…”

He held his breath. The thought of his girlfriend wearing his clothes, and especially if other’s saw her dressed in them letting people know who was really his, made his heart swell with pride. And the sight of you in front of him clad in his oversized hoodie, just stopping mid thigh giving a little teaser if you were even wearing pants or not underneath was a little too… enticing.

He let out a tired sigh, “Fucking hell… just- next time at least tell me when you take my shit so I won’t have to flip my entire fucking room around looking for it, got that!”

You nodded profusely. You were just glad you were let off with a subtle warning.

Just before he grabbed his pile of clothing he took one last look at you.

“And give me back that hoodie, I need it.”

“Huh? Right now?”

You acted a bit surprised as you clutched the material at your chest. It was almost suspicious.

“Yes right now. Didn’t you wanna go out on a date? It’s fucking cold outside so I need it.”

Your eyes shifted from the ash blonde to the floor nervously and your cheeks grew hot.

“I-I uh…”

“What the fuck is taking you so long? Just take it off already.” Bakugou was growing impatient, opting to just take it off you himself. His hands grabbed the hem of the jacket, pulling it up-

Oh.

You squeaked in embarrassment as your lower half was exposed. Your nether regions only covered by a thin lacy black panty.

You and the ash blonde stood there for a moment, frozen in the awkward position. Snapping out of your trance, you shoved the material back over your pelvis. Your face beet red and unable to face the male, your mind screaming with how embarrassed and stupid you were.

But Bakugou had something else in mind.

The unreadable expression on his features twisted into one of a playful grin and he stepped forward, wrapping his strong arms around your smaller waist. And in one swift motion he was picking you up and throwing you on the bed.

“Katsuki what are you doing?”

“On second thought, keep the hoodie. It looks much better on you.”

“What about the date-”

But you knew by the way he looked down at you with that familiar devious smirk, his crimson eyes pumping with lust, you could forget all about that date.

hope you enjoy!

“I um-”

“I’ve been looking for that shit everywhere and you had it the whole time?!” he snapped, walking forward causing you to back further into your room. Your hands flew up in front of you in defense.

“I thought you knew!!”

“Well obviously I fucking didn’t!!!”

He turned his head towards your closet, changing his line of direction to the stack of clothing in the shelves. He started hastily digging through your clothing, pulling out various black shirts adorned with the familiar skull design.

“Katsuki! What are you doing!!”

“Taking back what’s fucking mine, that’s what I’m fucking doing!!!”

You pulled at his arms, attempting to get him to stop for he was making an even bigger mess of clothes onto your floor, along with the beloved shirts you stole from your boyfriend being torn from your possession.

“Stop!- Hey!!!”

Once he finally got the last bit of the missing clothing, he turned to you. Arms crossed and looking at you like a parent scolding his child.

“Why did you take my clothes without telling me?”

You stood silently, pouting with your gaze pulled away from him.

“Answer me.”

“I… I like wearing your clothes… because it smells like you…”

He held his breath. The thought of his girlfriend wearing his clothes, and especially if other’s saw her dressed in them letting people know who was really his, made his heart swell with pride. And the sight of you in front of him clad in his oversized hoodie, just stopping mid thigh giving a little teaser if you were even wearing pants or not underneath was a little too… enticing.

He let out a tired sigh, “Fucking hell… just- next time at least tell me when you take my shit so I won’t have to flip my entire fucking room around looking for it, got that!”

You nodded profusely. You were just glad you were let off with a subtle warning.

Just before he grabbed his pile of clothing he took one last look at you.

“And give me back that hoodie, I need it.”

“Huh? Right now?”

You acted a bit surprised as you clutched the material at your chest. It was almost suspicious.

“Yes right now. Didn’t you wanna go out on a date? It’s fucking cold outside so I need it.”

Your eyes shifted from the ash blonde to the floor nervously and your cheeks grew hot.

“I-I uh…”

“What the fuck is taking you so long? Just take it off already.” Bakugou was growing impatient, opting to just take it off you himself. His hands grabbed the hem of the jacket, pulling it up-

Oh.

You squeaked in embarrassment as your lower half was exposed. Your nether regions only covered by a thin lacy black panty.

You and the ash blonde stood there for a moment, frozen in the awkward position. Snapping out of your trance, you shoved the material back over your pelvis. Your face beet red and unable to face the male, your mind screaming with how embarrassed and stupid you were.

But Bakugou had something else in mind.

The unreadable expression on his features twisted into one of a playful grin and he stepped forward, wrapping his strong arms around your smaller waist. And in one swift motion he was picking you up and throwing you on the bed.

“Katsuki what are you doing?”

“On second thought, keep the hoodie. It looks much better on you.”

“What about the date-”

But you knew by the way he looked down at you with that familiar devious smirk, his crimson eyes pumping with lust, you could forget all about that date.
trail.content:
hope you enjoy!

‘Where the fuck did that jacket go…’ Bakugou mentally cursed to himself.

He had been spending hours scavenging his room, practically flipping the entire space upside down, in search for his beloved hoodie, even going next door to accuse his red-head companion for stealing his clothing. But to no avail as he still couldn’t find it.

And this wasn’t the first time his clothes went missing. As a matter of fact this entire week he had noticed that more and more of his shirts and jackets were missing from his closet each day and it only fueled the irritation in the ash blonde. He even went as far as to spying out in the laundry room for any suspects for thieving his clothes.

He grumbled a curse to himself as he stepped out of his dorm room and headed towards yours. Him and his precious girlfriend of 1 year had planned a date for tonight and he knew better than to keep you waiting, knowing that if he kept you waiting too long you would sulk and pout all night.

A few seconds after he hit the door with a few light knocks it opened, welcoming his lover. The attire she wore completely washed away his previous frustrations.

“Katsu-!”

“Oi. where did you get that hoodie.”

You paused, looking down at the large black material that was obviously much too big for you. Your gaze looking back up to meet the heated stare of your boyfriend.

tags: sassy bakugou is also very good
title: Request Wednesday: Crossroads
body:
Bakugou x Kirishima

Kirishima buried the little box of knick-knacks at the center of the crossroads, but nothing happened. No blinding flash of light, no evil being popping up, nothing. He needed this to work so he could get his little girl back. It had to work.

“Mornin’ gorgeous,” Bakugou’s voice whispered into his ear.

Kirishima swatted him away, “What the fuck, Bakugou?”

“Sorry, did I scare you?”

“You know damn well that’s not what I’m talking about. You gave me 10 good years with her. You lied!”

“Now, now,” Bakugou rubbed his thumb over Kirishima’s bottom lip, “Tell daddy what’s wrong.”

“I was supposed to get 10 years. That was the deal!” he was holding back tears now, desperate to get his daughter back. “She died! Two years too early. You took her from me!”

“So what you’re telling me is your daughter, whomst you traded a deal for in the first place, has died of natural causes and you’re blaming…” he gestured wildly, “Moi?”

Kirishima stared, not really believing Bakugou wasn’t going to help him.

“Sorry baby,” he tucked his hands in his pockets, “Not my problem.”

Bakugou started walking away and Kirishima got scared. He was going to disappear and he’d be left with nothing.

“What’ll it take to get her back?” he dropped to his knees, buried his face in his hands. “Get those two years with her back, please.”

Bakugou paused and turned around, a wide smile spreading over his face, “I already own your soul, there’s not much else you could offer me.”

“I’ll spend the night with you,” Kirishima whispered, knew that was what Bakugou was looking for.

“Deal,” he laughed.

title: Drift
description:
by JuniperGentle

It’s their ninth Kaiju kill, but it only takes one mistake.
Todoroki Shouto, one of the two pilots of the Jaeger Boreal Lightning, loses everything in one shattering moment. Now he has no hope, no future, and most importantly no Midoriya Izuku.
The thing is, he can’t let go of the past - and there might be something else that can’t let go either.

Words: 16051, Chapters: 2/2, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of Compatible

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Major Character Death
  • Categories: Gen, M/M
  • Characters: Midoriya Izuku, Todoroki Shouto, Uraraka Ochako, Iida Tenya, Yaoyorozu Momo, Bakugou Katsuki, Kirishima Eijirou, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead, Yagi Toshinori | All Might
  • Relationships: Midoriya Izuku/Todoroki Shouto, Uraraka Ochako & Iida Tenya, Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Pacific Rim Fusion, Character Death, Canon-Typical Violence, Pacific Rim levels of violence and gore, The Drift (Pacific Rim), very brief mention of Todoroki Enji’s bad parenting, Run-On Sentences, so many run-on sentences, Grief/Mourning, Eventual Happy Ending
